channel.title: Stuff on RIPx80
channel.description: Recent content in Stuff on RIPx80

item.title: Goodbye Meertec
item.description: After a few years my website meertec.de which you can contact me for webdesign and other programming stuff goes offline. Now my personal website ripx80 can find temp. on this domain. After registration you will be redirected to ripx80.info. If you want some special or make me an offer, contact me about my e-mail address ripx80@protonmail.com So goodbye meertec.de
